label: 馬借
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Teamsters who used horses to transport rice and other goods from rural areas to the cities. By the Kamakura period, they had a virtual monopoly over land shipment, and in the Muromachi period, guilds (za) were formed to consolidate that monopoly.　[座]
